[i]“You've got a second chance. Don't waste it.”
— Creed, of Graygulch
[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Lingering Guide enters, mill two cards.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“You trespass, yet we are the savages?”
—Chief Striking Dawn
[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Lone Stranger enters, if you control no other creatures, create two 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Always lend your ear to strangers. You never know when they're rich, or just mad.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If you control a Spirit, draw a card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Some cowboys still tell tales of old Daisite, a city running on steam and spirit until both fought back. Its haunted ruins still hide every sunrise.
[/i]

cards.rules_text: {2}{G}: Loreweaver's base power and toughness each become equal to the number of cards in your graveyard until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Lost tales can still be told.
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Reveal the top card of your library. Draw X cards, where X is that card's mana value.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Gamblers don't trust the word luck, offering their hopes to Lady Lucy instead. Sometimes, she listens.
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. Make an Entrance deals 2 damage to up to one target creature.

Flying, vigilance
Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Maligned Scavenger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]When fresh prey dries up, griffins learn how to live on the ghosts left behind.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
When enchanted creature dies, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever another creature with power 4 or greater you control enters, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The greatest of us can still learn from the smallest of us.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Never make a fair trade if you don't have to. And if you do, cheat anyway.”
—Lexie Boggs, aether baron
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target opponent discards two cards, then sacrifices a creature.

When Mighty Totem enters, scry 1.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice Mighty Totem: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, create a Gold token for each creature you controlled that became tapped this turn. (It's an artifact with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)

Vigilance
Ignore all effects that would prevent Mistbreaker from attacking or blocking. (If an effect says it “can't” attack or block, it still can. This ability doesn't let it attack or block if it's tapped or attack if it has summoning sickness.)
Whenever Moonlit Lurker blocks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Shine brightest in the darkest of nights.
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+2 and gains “Whenever this creature attacks, you may post a bounty on target creature.” (Put a bounty counter on that creature. It has “When this creature dies, each opponent draws a card” as long as it has a bounty counter on it.)
Destroy target creature.
Whenever a creature with flying attacks you, gain control of that creature at end of combat.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Many scarecrows seem better at collecting the birds than scaring them.”
—Calamity Rose
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a card is put into a graveyard this turn, you may put it on the bottom of its owner's library.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“It's best not to think too much about the oddities that get dragged out of those woods.”
—Calamity Rose
[/i]

cards.rules_text: {2}{U}, Sacrifice Nameless Drifter: Draw a card for each creature that left the battlefield this turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“I've known more thieves without names than with. Nameless means you're no one. That you're untouchable.”
—Roxite, of Nightrail
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Scry 1.

{1}, Discard a card: Create a Gold token. (It's an artifact with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.
{B}, Discard a card: Post a bounty on target creature. (Put a bounty counter on that creature. It has “When this creature dies, each opponent draws a card” as long as it has a bounty counter on it.)
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“New name, new face, new life. All it'll cost you is a bit of coin.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Other Rogues you control have menace.
{2}{U}: Target blocking creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text:

cards.rules_text: Whenever Nightrail Printer attacks, you may tap target creature.
cards.flavor_text:

cards.rules_text: Nightshade Cultivator has deathtouch as long as five or more cards are in your graveyard.

cards.rules_text:
Prowess
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature can't block this turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]While each one is shorter than the average boot, one should never underestimate goblins in numbers.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vision (Whenever this or another creature you control enters, reveal the top card of your library. Then you may put that card into your graveyard.)
Whenever Weaver of the Winds envisions an instant or sorcery card, draw a card.

Draw two cards, then discard two cards if it's a combat step.
Quickdraw {U} (When a creature you control blocks or becomes blocked, you may cast this spell for {U}.)

Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you may post a bounty on target creature. (Put a bounty counter on that creature. It has “When this creature dies, each opponent draws a card” as long as it has a bounty counter on it.)
Exile the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates them into two piles. You may put one pile into your hand or draw two cards. Then put the rest of the piles into your graveyard.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“I just don't quite like the look of any of them, to be honest.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Gain control of target creature if its power is less than or equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Quickdraw {4}{U}{U} (When a creature you control blocks or becomes blocked, you may cast this spell for {4}{U}{U}.)

Whenever equipped creature attacks, it gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Equip {2}
cards.flavor_text:
[i]From the horses and giant lizards to harses and drunken centaurs, there are plenty of creatures willing to give you a lift.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Wu, the Shackled enters, you may have an opponent gain control of it. If you do, draw two cards.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you don't own Wu, it fights another target creature you control and its owner draws a card.
Exile each creature you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Don't go chasing after ghosts. You'll have to find your own way back.”
—Calamity Rose
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
Ignore all effects that would prevent Mistbreaker from attacking or blocking.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Spells and words are but distractions.
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Destroy target creature.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Save face or eat crow.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flash
If a card or token would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
